Authors: Lolo S., Pratama B.C., Mufarih M., Wang G.
Title: An Analysis of the Gamification Use in Learning Management System
Source title: 2019 International Conference of Computer Science and Information Technology, ICoSNIKOM 2019
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Lolo, S., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Pratama, B.C., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Mufarih, M., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Wang, G., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: The concept of incorporating game elements into non-game applications has become a trend lately. In this study we explore and identify variables that affect learning experiences and how knowing they can help in applying game mechanisms to Learning Management Systems (LMS) that are flexible in their operations so that they can be improved as needed using cloud infrastructure. This study attempts to assess how, why and where gamification and cloud computing should be used in the context of learning management systems by exploring both existing learning management systems using game mechanisms and views on how gamification can be used to encourage overall student learning experiences. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Computer education; e-learning; Gamification; Learning Management System
Index Keywords: Computer games; Gamification; Cloud infrastructures; Game elements; Learning experiences; Learning management system; Student learning experiences; Learning systems
